title: How to switch off or restart the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3
content:
While you can simply press and hold the power button on most Android devices to bring up the power menu, things aren’t as simple when it comes to newer Samsung devices. By default, if you press and hold the power button (or Side Key, as Samsung likes to call it) on a Galaxy smartphone, it

The post How to switch off or restart the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Got yourself a brand new Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 but can't figure out how to switch it off? Here's how to switch off or restart this phone.
